Package edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree

Class AbstractBinaryTree<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree.AbstractTree<E>
      • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree.AbstractBinaryTree<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of elements stored in the binary tree
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryTree<E>, Tree<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkedBinaryTree
    public abstract class AbstractBinaryTree<E>
extends AbstractTree<E>
implements BinaryTree<E>
    A skeletal implementation of the Binary Tree abstract data type. This class provides implementation for common methods that can be implemented the same no matter what specific type of concrete data structure is used to implement the binary tree abstract data type.
    Author:
    Dr. King, Will Greene
